default.title: SHARE MY DATA
default.description: With this form, you can register your consent, optionally share additional data, and agree to the terms.

default.title: Terms
default._docx_description: Do you agree with the terms relevant to the queer bodies representation study here ?
default.description: Do you agree with the terms relevant to the queer bodies representation study here ?

default.title: Which data do you agree to share ?
default.description:
Please check all the boxes (enable them by visiting the corresponding tabs), and if you so wish, select pictures by clicking the Individual files checkbox.
Then click Download results to get your encrypted data, and click Drop file here, which takes you to the webpage where you can upload your data.
